description: Enterprise techniques used by Nidiran, ATT&CK software S0118 v1.1
name: Nidiran (S0118)

techniques.comment: [Nidiran](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0118) can create a new service named msamger (Microsoft Security Accounts Manager).(Citation: Symantec Backdoor.Nidiran)
[Nidiran](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0118) can download and execute files.(Citation: Symantec Backdoor.Nidiran)

[Nidiran](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0118) can create a new service named msamger (Microsoft Security Accounts Manager), which mimics the legitimate Microsoft database by the same name.(Citation: Symantec Backdoor.Nidiran)(Citation: Microsoft SAM)
